trans-unit.source: Manages a list of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 管理清單<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CurrencyManager derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: CurrencyManager 衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return either a CurrencyManager or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>以傳回 CurrencyManager 或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: The actual object returned depends on the data source and data member passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的實際物件取決於傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>的資料來源和資料成員

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the type will be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源是物件可傳回的單一屬性 （而不是物件的清單），類型就是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> as the data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>做為資料來源，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>會傳回。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the data source is an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, a CurrencyManager will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果相反地，資料來源是該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>介面，將會傳回 CurrencyManager。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A> property returns the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>屬性會傳回目前的項目基礎清單中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the current item, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更目前的項目，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>屬性設為新值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value must be greater than 0 and must be less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值必須大於 0，而且必須是小於的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> property is set to `true`, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料來源實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>介面，而<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A>屬性設定為`true`，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 將新的項目加入基礎清單中。

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface and the data source allows adding rows (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅支援資料來源實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>介面和資料來源可讓加入資料列 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A>是`true`)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property was designed to allow complex-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, to add new items to list.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性設計用來讓複雜繫結控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>控制項，加入新項目到清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this property only if you are creating your own control that incorporates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 您通常使用這個屬性，只有當您要建立您自己的控制項，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, to add items if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class.
trans-unit.target: 否則，若要新增項目如果資料來源<xref:System.Data.DataView>，請使用<xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法的<xref:System.Data.DataView>類別。</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method and add the row to the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>方法並將資料列加入至<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>。</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The underlying data source does not implement <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>, or the data source has thrown an exception because the user has attempted to add a row to a read-only or fixed-size <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料來源不會實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref>，資料來源已擲回例外狀況，因為使用者已嘗試加入的資料列，以唯讀或固定大小或<xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消目前的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if the objects contained by the data source implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅支援資料來源所包含的物件實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: If the objects contained within the data source do not implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface, changes made to the data will not be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源中所包含的物件不會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>介面，對資料進行的變更不會被捨棄。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property was designed to be used by complex data-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, to cancel edits.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性設計用來使用複雜資料繫結控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>控制項，以取消編輯。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the user presses the ESC key, the CancelCurrentEdit method is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當使用者按下 ESC 鍵，CancelCurrentEdit 方法上呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: Unless you are creating a control that requires this same functionality, you should not use this method.
trans-unit.target: 除非您要建立需要相同功能的控制項，您不應該使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> class.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>方法的<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>類別。</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if there is no list, or the list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有清單，或清單是空的就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: There is no list, or the list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何清單，或者清單是空的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得清單中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the count property to determine when the end of a list has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 使用 count 屬性來判斷當已到達清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> maintains a 0-based array of items, the end of the list is always Count minus one.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>維護永遠是以 0 為基礎的陣列項目，清單結尾計數減一。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 在清單中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的項目清單中。

trans-unit.source: In order to get the current item, you must know its data type in order to cast it correctly.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前的項目，您必須知道其資料類型才能正確地將它轉換。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you must cast the current item as a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataView>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，您必須轉換為目前的項目<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>物件。</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: A list item of type <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 類型<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>的清單項目

trans-unit.source: Ends the current edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 結束目前的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if the objects contained by the data source implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅支援資料來源所包含的物件實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property was designed to be used by complex data-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性設計用來使用複雜資料繫結控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Unless you are creating a control that requires this same functionality, you should not use this method.
trans-unit.target: 除非您要建立需要相同功能的控制項，您不應該使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, if the data source is either a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> class.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，如果資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataView>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，請使用<xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>方法的<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>類別。</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the data type of the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料類型的清單。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property descriptor collection for the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎清單的屬性描述項集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is used to specify a column in the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>用來指定資料行清單中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> for the list.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the list supplying the data for the binding using the specified set of bound properties.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供資料給繫結使用指定的繫結屬性集清單的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For the GetListName method to be successful, the underlying list must be of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功 GetListName 方法，基礎清單必須是型別<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> of properties to be found in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref>要在資料來源中找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If successful, a <xref:System.String> containing name of the list supplying the data for the binding; otherwise, an <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功的話，<xref:System.String>包含提供資料給繫結清單的名稱; 否則<xref:System.String>字串。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current item has been altered.
trans-unit.target: 目前的項目已變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The ItemChanged event will occur when the user calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者呼叫時，會發生 ItemChanged 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ItemChanged event occurs only when the item itself has been changed in some manner.
trans-unit.target: ItemChanged 事件才會發生在項目本身已變更的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the value of an item is changed from 10 to 42, the event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果項目的值從 10 變更為 42，就會發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This should not be confused with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged> event where the item has been changed to a new item.
trans-unit.target: 這應該不與混淆<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged>事件項目已變更至新的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The event will also occur if the underlying data changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料變更，也會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the value of a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>, the ItemChanged event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您變更的值<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>，就會發生 ItemChanged 事件。</xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are creating your own control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, you should use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged?displayProperty=fullName> instead of the ItemChanged event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您要建立您自己使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>，您應該使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged?displayProperty=fullName>而不是 ItemChanged 事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs> enables you to determine the type of action that has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs>可讓您判斷發生的動作類型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個清單<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object returned by the List property can be cast to any type that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 清單屬性所傳回的物件可以轉換成實作的任何類型<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: This will be commonly used when you know the type of the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 這將常用於當您知道基礎清單的類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are data-bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the underlying list is a <xref:System.Data.DataView> (which implements <xref:System.Collections.IList>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您是資料繫結至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，基礎清單是<xref:System.Data.DataView>(它會實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>)。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Other classes that implement the interface (this is not a complete list) include <xref:System.Array>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 實作的介面 （這不是完整的清單） 的其他類別包含<xref:System.Array>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，和<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: How you use the List property depends on the class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 清單屬性的使用方式取決於實作的類別<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the List property to determine the name of the list.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用清單屬性來判斷清單的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> method to return the name of the current table.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>介面，您可以使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A>方法以傳回目前資料表的名稱。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: This is shown in the C# code below: ```c# private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ```
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼所示︰```c# private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ```

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> that contains the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>包含清單。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於清單變更或清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The ListChanged event is thrown by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> class when changes to an item are made using methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ListChanged 事件，所擲回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>類別的項目變更時使用下列方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Refresh%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: This event can also occur when the data source is edited directly if it implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果它實作直接編輯資料來源時也會發生此事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: The associated `OnListChanged` method is a private method in this class.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯`OnListChanged`方法是在此類別中的私用方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the current position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> in the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定目前的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>清單中。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> property is greater than 0, the listposition field is a number between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>屬性為大於 0，listposition 欄位是介於 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>減 1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> is 0, listposition is -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>為 0，listposition 為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的中繼資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List*>已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List*>

trans-unit.source: The metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List%2A> consists of the schema of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List%2A>基礎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的結構描述所組成</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List%2A>的中繼資料

trans-unit.source: The MetaDataChanged event is raised when that schema has changed.
trans-unit.target: 該結構描述變更時，會引發 MetaDataChanged 事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the MetaDataChanged event is raised when a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> is programmatically added to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，MetaDataChanged 事件就會引發<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>以程式設計方式加入至<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable></xref:System.Data.DataColumn>時

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentItemChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnItemChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnItemChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.MetaDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.MetaDataChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnMetaDataChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnMetaDataChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnPositionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPositionChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position you are at within the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定您位於清單中的位置。

trans-unit.source: An important property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> class is the Position property.
trans-unit.target: 重要的屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>類別是 Position 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: In a list of items, you can view only one item out of the entire list.
trans-unit.target: 在清單中的項目，您可以檢視整個清單只有一個項目。

trans-unit.source: To determine which item is viewed, set the Position to a number between 0 (the beginning of the list) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> minus 1 (the end of the list).
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪一個項目檢視，將位置設定為 0 （清單的開頭） 之間的數字和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>減去 1 （清單結尾）。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the Position determines the currency, or place in the list, of all controls bound to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，位置決定貨幣或在清單中，繫結至相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>的所有控制項的位置

trans-unit.source: For example, imagine a list consisting of two columns called "FirstName" and "LastName".
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設有兩個稱為"FirstName"和"LastName"的資料行所組成的清單。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls are bound to the same list; the first control is bound to the first column, and the second control is bound to the second column.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項的繫結到相同清單的第一個控制項繫結至第一個資料行，而第二個控制項繫結至第二個資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When the Position of the common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is set to the third position, both controls display the appropriate values for that position in the list.
trans-unit.target: 當一般位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>設定為第三個位置中，兩個控制項顯示清單中的該位置的適當值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the item at position three consists of the first name "John" and the last name "Smith", the bound controls will display "John" and "Smith".
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果在三個位置的項目是由"John"名字和姓氏"Smith"所組成，繫結的控制項就會顯示"John"和"Smith"。

trans-unit.source: A number between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count*> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 介於 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count*>減 1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Forces a repopulation of the data-bound list.
trans-unit.target: 強制重新填入資料繫結清單。

trans-unit.source: Use the Refresh method when the data source does not support notification when it is changed (for example, if it is an <xref:System.Array>).
trans-unit.target: 資料來源變更時不支援通知時，請使用重新整理方法 (例如，如果它是<xref:System.Array>)。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAt method was designed to allow complex controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, to remove items from the list.
trans-unit.target: RemoveAt 方法設計用來讓複雜的控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>控制，可從清單中移除項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You should not use this method to actually remove items.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該使用這個方法實際上移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class to delete items.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.DataView>類別，以刪除項目。</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to remove from the list.
trans-unit.target: 要從清單中移除之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: There is no row at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 沒有資料列中的指定位置 index 。

trans-unit.source: Resumes data binding.
trans-unit.target: 繼續資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A> and ResumeBinding are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of in a simple data binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>而且 ResumeBinding 允許暫存的暫停與繼續的簡單資料繫結案例中的兩種方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者必須能夠對數個編輯資料欄位發生驗證之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果必須變更一個欄位，根據第二個，但在此驗證的第一個欄位會導致錯誤的第二個欄位。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A> prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until ResumeBinding is called but does not prevent changes in the data source from affecting the bound controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>防止變更發送到資料來源的直到 ResumeBinding 呼叫，但不會防止資料來源中的變更會影響繫結的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用複雜資料繫結，例如控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，更新其值，例如根據變更事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will not prevent these events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法不會防止這些事件發生。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A> and ResumeBinding are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>且依設計搭配簡單繫結控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ResumeBinding</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用這些方法在複雜繫結案例中如果要抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>藉由設定事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Suspends data binding to prevents changes from updating the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 暫止資料繫結，以防止變更更新繫結的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The SuspendBinding and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> methods allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: SuspendBinding 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>方法允許暫存的暫停與繼續資料繫結中的簡單繫結案例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者必須做數個編輯資料欄位發生驗證之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果必須變更一個欄位，根據第二個，但在此驗證的第一個欄位會導致錯誤的第二個欄位。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> prevents changes from being applied to the data source until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>防止變更套用至資料來源，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>呼叫，但不會實際阻止任何事件發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用複雜資料繫結，例如控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，更新其值以變更事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> will not prevent complex-bound controls from receiving events to update the data source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>不會防止複雜繫結控制項接收更新資料來源的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>專為簡單繫結控制項中這類<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用這些方法在複雜繫結案例中如果要抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>藉由設定事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Updates the status of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 更新繫結的狀態。
